title: Forgotten pbe username
body: How can i watch my pbe account username?

replies.body: We can't readily give out usernames since they're part of secure account details, but if you look for the signup email you got you might be able to figure that out. You can also reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to ask for some help remembering as well!
